question: This state government plans to introduce the geotag livestock farmer houses in the state.
explanation: Kerala govt is gearing up to geotag the houses & farms of over 10 lakh livestock & poultry farmers in the state as part of its massive digitisation drive. The objective is to compile a comprehensive digital repository of information of animal husbandry & dairying in the state. The data would be useful during the time of the outbreak of any diseases among domestic animals and birds.
